plot: Alex face his first day at his new job as a security guard at Ural Building. His job is not as easy as it looks. A quiet night gradually turns into a disturbing nightmare.
title: Edificio Ural
plot_es: Alex face his first day at his new job as a security guard at Ural Building. His job is not as easy as it looks. A quiet night gradually turns into a disturbing nightmare.
plot_en: Alex face his first day at his new job as a security guard at Ural Building. His job is not as easy as it looks. A quiet night gradually turns into a disturbing nightmare.
